law.text:
A statutory trust is dissolved by:
Administrative dissolution under Subchapter 7 of KRS Chapter 14A;
The filing of articles of dissolution under KRS 386A.8-020:
On the occurrence of an event or circumstance that the governing instrument states causes dissolution; or
With the approval of the beneficial owners;
Having no beneficial owners for ninety (90) days; or
Judicial dissolution in accordance with KRS 386A.8-030.
law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 64, effective July 12, 2012.
